query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, c.name as campaignName, c.slug
FROM teams t
JOIN campaigns c ON t.campaignId = c.id
WHERE t.name LIKE '%Palmeiras%' OR t.name LIKE '%Santos%'
ORDER BY t.id DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4BVDFYYBjXPHJtC.709074b71e30 --database EvJULGQoHRNqTu98ru5T2m --execute SELECT t.id, t.name, c.name as campaignName, c.slug

JOIN campaigns c ON t.campaignId = c.id
